summary:
New land-New Player Home(Adoption available with TMPhoenix Adoption mod.)
A few simple quests-New weapon, and Source of the Stalhrim Smithing.

3 files, a clean non npc island for your own design, a PG version with Vanilla sets, and a overhaul character design npcs for the custom race.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#980000][size=4][color=#1e84cc][size=5]The Harii-[/size][/color]
[color=#ffffff][size=2]An ancient German Tribe with not much information. Other than that these painted warriors would stalk their prey/ enemy in the night, and used unique tactics during their assaults. Here in Skyrim they have evolved and their tactics have intrigued the nosey Thalmor. Take control of a Harii, or aid this Ancient tribe and join the fight to end the Thalmor's reign of Tyranny against not only the Harii but the Skaal as well.
[color=#1e84cc][size=4]
Requirments:
[/size][/color][color=#1e84cc]Hearthfire:[/color] For Adoption, and other living conditions.
[color=#1e84cc]Dragonborn:[/color] The setting is based off of Solstiem, and evolving from the Skaal quests.

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]Recommendation Mods: (Not required)
[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29249/?]TMPhoenix Multiple Adoption Mod[/url][color=#ffffff][size=2]This will make it so you can move your family to Dragon Tamer Hall!
[url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36761]HL84's little Caravan and Childs Clothes[/url]

[/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#1e84cc]This does not affect the Source of Stalhrim quest, but it adds onto the North Shore landing, by placing Alderian, The cell Below decks, and a chest containing some items. If you complete the Source of Stahlrim Quest by way of killing the Thalmor, these all disappear, so make sure to grab the right Quest items, and Nykie. Nykie will be made a follower after rescuing her.

Also, sorry for no female voices, and horrible male voices. I'm not the best, and this mod is not as pretty as Faalskar and others, but hope its still enjoyable. Thank you and please Endorse.[/color]


[/size][/color][/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=5][color=#1e84cc]What is this MOD?[/color]
[/size][/color]A new Island LOD Generated, and Navmeshed.
A new Custom Race, with special benefits, and hardships.
A few minor side quests involving battles vs the Thalmor.
Evolving on the Story of the Thalmor's interest in Stalhrim, and Tribal Combat Techniques in war.
A new player home Dragon Tamer Hall, plus an option of a small bed, chest and sack in Pack Hunter Rest.
Guard system and jail system, under water exploration.

[color=#1e84cc][size=4]The Harii-[color=#ffffff][size=2] One and Two handed, Heavy and Light Armor +5, Smithing, Block, and Archery +10
[/size][/color][/size][/color]Harii Resistance Ability: Your  blood gives you <50>% resistance to Frost, grants a <35>% resistance to disease, and gives you <20%> resistance to poison.
Harii Special ability: Fortify Sneak +20.
Harii Weakness: 50% More Magika damage.
The Harii can regain stamina much faster than any other race, plus because of it, their health regains a little more too.
Because of no magic in their blood, the regaining of magika is very slow, and are very weak against magical opponents.

[size=4][color=#1e84cc]Included in this MOD![/color]
[size=2]5 files:
1-A LOD & Navmeshed Island with no NPC's or quests or custom race, just the island itself for your own interest.
2-A PG version using Vanilla skin and body mesh.
3-An Overhaul version with new skin texture and body mesh.
4-Misc files for the LOD generation, and face tint fix file.(Grey head)
5-Reeking Cave: For those who have already completed the Thalmor Embassy Quest, during the Main Storyline. Puts a bridge to get back to the trap door of the dungeon of the Thalmor Embassy.

[size=4][color=#1e84cc]Dragon Tamer Hall: Player Home
[/color][color=#1e84cc][size=2][color=#ffffff]A master bed with some storage; dresser, end tables, and weapon chest.
4 Mannequins for décor.
Some cabinets and food storage containers.
A book shelf that can hold 20 books in the play room.
Play room?
For the kids silly!
Kids?
Yes, by using TMPhoenix Adoption mod, you can adopt up to 3 kids, and move your spouse to this Home.

Also, before you get this home you can use a bunk, chest, and sack in Pack Hunters Rest.

[/color]Plus check the permission section, I hope I got everybody, and I want to thank those who gave me permission, and I give credit to all the guys and girls for their work. If I forgot someone, or there is a issue, please let me know!!!
[/size][/color][/size]
[color=#1e84cc][size=6]PLEASE CHECK THE READ ME BEFORE YOU HAVE QUESTIONS
[/size][/color]
[/size][/size][color=#ff0000][size=4][color=#1e84cc][size=5]Questions!!!!
[/size][/color][color=#1e84cc][size=4]Can you...[/size][/color][size=4]
[/size][color=#ffffff][size=4]Sorry What you see is what you get. Unless for some fixes, bugs, or personal adding.

[/size][/color][color=#1e84cc]Can you help me with Quests???[/color]
[/size][/color][color=#ffffff][size=2]I myself am still very new to scripts and quests,I have been going along with tutorials, and back tracking, and mostly LUCK!!![/size][/color]
author: Jrew
